derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: imitative of a sound made with closed lips
late Middle English: compare with mum and Middle Low German mummen

encyclopedia.content: MUM介绍 MUM这支来自冰岛的电子迷幻乐队，继承了冰岛一贯的空灵风格，玄妙的电子配乐和歌者呓语似的咛唱，直接穿透心脏，进入灵魂的深处。MUM成员 MUM由2男2女：Orvar Toreyjarson Smarason, Gyea Valtysdottir, Kristin Anna Valtysdottir, Gunnar Orn Tynes所组成。Kristin & Gyea 则是一对孪生姐妹。专辑 在2004年的《Summer Make Good》后，Mum已经三年没出过正经专辑了。在这三年中，Mum发生了一些无法忽略的变化：为乐

example.ex: Mum and Dad are coming for lunch...
example.tran: 爸爸和妈妈要来吃午饭。

entry.def: If you keep mum or stay mum about something, you do not tell anyone about it.

example.ex: He is keeping mum about his feelings on the matter.
example.tran: 他闭口不谈他对此事的个人感受。

sentences.en: There was always a honeymoon period when Mum started a new job.
sentences.cn: 妈妈每开始一份新工作总会有一阵儿新鲜劲。

sentences.en: The cat acted as a surrogate mum to the chicks.
sentences.cn: 这只貓当起了小鸡的妈妈来。

sentences.en: Your mum will go spare if you don’t go to school!
sentences.cn: 要是你不上学,你妈妈会气坏的!

sentences.en: I just kept mum when she asked me where Ben was. She’d be furious if she knew.
sentences.cn: 她问我本在哪里,我没有告诉她。如果她知道了,一定非常生气。

sentences.en: I just kept mum when she asked me where Ben was. She’d be furious if she knew.
sentences.cn: 她问我本在哪里，我没有告诉她。如果她知道了，一定非常生气。

sentences.en: Please will everyone keep mum about Saturday. We want to give them a real surprise.
sentences.cn: 请大家对周六的事情保密，我们想给他们一个惊喜。

sentences.en: ‘Nobody must mention this project outside the office. I hope that’s clear.’ ‘We understand, John. Mum’s the word!’
sentences.cn: “请大家千万不要在办公室以外的地方谈论这个项目，我希望每个人都明白这一点。”“约翰，放心吧，我们都理解，守口如瓶！”
